connectorUiConfig.title: Pathlock Inc.: Threat Detection and Response for SAP
connectorUiConfig.descriptionMarkdown:
The [**Pathlock Threat Detection**](https://pathlock.com/) integration with **Microsoft Sentinel** strengthens SAP security by delivering unified, real-time visibility into threats across all SAP systems. This seamless integration allows Security Operations Centers (SOCs) to correlate SAP-specific alerts with broader enterprise security data, creating a single, comprehensive view of the organization’s risk landscape.

By leveraging advanced analytics and AI-assisted insights through **Microsoft Security Copilot**, Pathlock identifies complex attack behaviors, configuration weaknesses, and authorization risks within SAP environments. The solution scales effortlessly across on-premise, cloud, and hybrid SAP landscapes, ensuring consistent protection regardless of system architecture.

Through its deep integration, Pathlock bridges the operational gap between IT and SAP security teams—empowering organizations to detect, investigate, and respond to threats faster, strengthen compliance, and continuously enhance their overall security posture.

instructionSteps.title: 1. Create ARM Resources and Provide the Required Permissions
instructionSteps.description: We will create data collection rule (DCR) and data collection endpoint (DCE) resources. We will also create a Microsoft Entra app registration and assign the required permissions to it.

parameters.content:
#### Automated deployment of Azure resources
Clicking on "Deploy push connector resources" will trigger the creation of DCR and DCE resources.
It will then create a Microsoft Entra app registration with client secret and grant permissions on the DCR. This setup enables data to be sent securely to the DCR using a OAuth v2 client credentials.
